text: phir hamane lagaataar bahut se paigambar bheje (magar) jab jab kisee ummat ka paigambar un ke paas aata to ye log usako jhuthalaate the to ham thee (aage peechhe) ek ko doosare ke baad (halaak) karate gae aur hamane unhen (nest va naabood karake) aphasaana bana diya to eemaan na laane vaalo par khuda kee laanat hai
